parameters.name: ClusterId
parameters.description: The ID of the SAP HANA instance.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The page number. Pages start from page 1. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Valid values: 1 to 99. Default value: 10.\`

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group.

parameters.name: RestoreId
parameters.description: The ID of the restore job.

parameters.name: RestoreStatus
parameters.description:
The status of the restore job. Valid values:

*   **RUNNING**: The job is running.
*   **COMPLETE**: The job is completed.
*   **PARTIAL_COMPLETE**: The job is partially completed.
*   **FAILED**: The job failed.
*   **CANCELED**: The job is canceled.
*   **EXPIRED**: The job timed out.

parameters.name: VaultId
parameters.description: The ID of the backup vault.
